sense.def:
Loss
je dejstvo, da nečesa nimamo več ali imamo tistega manj kot prej.

Loss of life
se zgodi, kadar nekdo umre.

seg.quote: The loss of life was appalling.

sense.def:
The loss of a relative or friend
je smrt sorodnika ali prijatelja.

seg.quote: ...the loss of my daughter and husband.

sense.def:
Kadar neko podjetje
makes a loss
, zasluži manj kot porabi.

seg.quote: The company announced a huge loss for the first half of the year.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
at a loss
, ne ve, kaj naj stori.

seg.quote: I was at a complete loss as to how I could lay my hands on the money.

sense.def:
To cut one's losses
pomeni prenehati početi tisto, kar smo počeli, in sprejeti poraz, da se slab položaj ne bi še bolj poslabšal.

seg.quote: You ought to cut your losses and start again.
